snippet: A man accused of setting off a small explosion in Washington Square Park was recalled as a boy who was fascinated with explosives.
abstract: Police in Grand View-on-Hudson, NY, paint menacing childhood portrait of Aaron Greene, who was arrested in December in his Greenwich Village apartment along with girlfriend Morgan Gliedman on charges of possessing explosives; police in Greene's childhood hometown say he fixated on weapons and explosives as a child.
lead_paragraph: A man accused of setting off a small explosion in Washington Square Park was recalled as a boy who was fascinated with explosives.

headline.seo: Aaron Greene Was Fascinated by Explosives as a Child, Police Say
headline.main: As Child, Suspect Fixated on Explosives, Police Say
headline.print_headline: As Child, Suspect Fixated on Explosives, the Police Say
